text: Sele Sabathumela abaThunywa beThu nemiqondiso ecacileyo Sathumela neziBhalo kubo nendlela yokugweba khona ukuze abantu bahlale besebulungiseni. Kananjalo Sathumela2 intsimbi ekukho amandla amakhulu emikhosi kuyo (nezinye izinto) eziyinzuzo eluntwini khon’ukuze uAllâh Enze bacace abo baMxhasayo neziThunywa zaKhe ezingabonwayo. Inene uAllâh Unamandla, Unobunganga
